FreeBSD.org pkg mirror

This is pkg0.nyi.freebsd.org - an east coast US regional mirror for pkg(8).

It is generously hosted by New York Internet in New Jersey, USA.

We use MaxMind GeoLite based geo-dns to choose a close mirror for you.

IMPORTANT: We do NOT guarantee uptime of any particular mirror. We provide SRV fallbacks for redundancy.

This server's package sets:

  • FreeBSD:8:i386 (no longer updated)
  • FreeBSD:8:amd64 (no longer updated)
  • FreeBSD:9:i386 (no longer updated)
  • FreeBSD:9:amd64 (no longer updated)
  • FreeBSD:10:i386
  • FreeBSD:10:amd64
  • FreeBSD:11:i386
  • FreeBSD:11:amd64
  • FreeBSD:11:aarch64
  • FreeBSD:12:i386
  • FreeBSD:12:amd64
  • FreeBSD:12:aarch64

Tier-2 support package sets:

  • FreeBSD:11:armv6 (only quarterly is updated)
  • FreeBSD:11:mips (only quarterly is updated)
  • FreeBSD:11:mips64 (only quarterly is updated)
  • FreeBSD:12:armv6
  • FreeBSD:12:armv7
  • FreeBSD:12:mips
  • FreeBSD:12:mips64

Other mirrors:

  • pkg0.bme.freebsd.org
  • pkg0.isc.freebsd.org
  • pkg0.twn.freebsd.org

FreeBSD.org home
